title: Comment from Freedom From Religion Foundation

analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule would broaden the permissible reasons to dismiss career employees and allow the President to install replacements based on political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service, the erosion of merit-based protections, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge. It emphasizes the importance of maintaining an apolitical workforce to ensure fair governance.
